alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 1:31AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Natrona and southeastern Johnson Counties through 215 AM MDT... At 131 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Teapot Rock, which is also 26 miles north of Casper, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Teapot Rock around 150 AM MDT. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 202 and 228. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County
